#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        int n,k;
        float x,y;
        cin>>n>>k>>x>>y;

        //bayes theorem
        float denom = n - (k*x + (n-k)*y);
        float val = (n-k)*(1-y) / denom;

        printf("%.4f\n",val);
    }
}
